abilities.name: Shadow Hunt
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any Basic Pokémon in your discard pile. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Peerless Hundred Blows-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
